short_summary: Procurement, Delivery and Installation of Monitor Arms.
description: Health Canada purchasing monitor arms. This may involve delivery to Ottawa and may be governed by ALEC
full_summary:
# Procurement and Installation of Monitor Arms

## Tender Details

- **Tender Reference:** PW-22-01015558
- ** Solicitation Number:** 1000247381
- **Publication Date:** December 1, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date:** December 15, 2022, 2:00 PM (EST)

## Tender Description

Health Canada is soliciting proposals from qualified suppliers to provide Monitor Arms for their office furniture requirements. The scope of work includes the purchase, delivery, and installation of these items in Ottawa on or before March 31, 2023.

## Tender Details (French)

- **Référence de l'appel d'offres:** PW-22-01015558
- **Numéro de sollicitation:** 1000247381
- **Date de publication:** 1 décembre 2022
- **Date de clôture de l'appel d'offres:** 15 décembre 2022, 14h00 (HAE)

## Tender Description (French)

Santé Canada lance un appel public à propositions concernant les besoins de produits d'ameublement, notamment les supports d'écran. Le marché comprend l'achat, la livraison et l'installation de ces biens à Ottawa au plus tard le 31 mars 2023.

## Contact Information

- **Point de contact:** Christian Belanger
- **Courriel:** <chris@mpsGC.majoromic.ca>chnitzbleges Boisej.cl repmat[list]
- **Téléphone:** (613) 697-0681
- **Adresse:** 200, Eglantine Driveway, Tunney's Pasture, ON K1A 0K9

## Important

This tender opportunity is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). Bid solicitation documents and additional information can be found at the following links:

- **English Version:** [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/ ...](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/ ...)
- **French Version:** [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/ ...](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/ ...) Point of Contact
